data.title: Last Call! Enter To Win Tickets To See Metallica In Minneapolis
data.meta_description: The entry deadline is fast approaching, so enter now to see Metallica at U.S. Bank Stadium.
data.text:
Metallica’s M72 World Tour is preparing to invade U.S. Bank Stadium in Minneapolis on Friday, August 16, and Sunday, August, 18. The band previously had the honor of being the first rock band to play at U.S. Bank Stadium in 2016.

Metallica will deliver two shows this time, each featuring a different set list and opening acts. Mammoth WVH and Pantera will open on August 16, with Ice Nine Kills and Five Finger Death Punch opening on August 18.

It'll be an epic weekend and we want you to get a taste, and we're making it easy to win.

Win Tickets To See Metallica On Sunday, August 18

Enter below to win tickets to the Sunday Metallica show in Minneapolis. We'll draw random winners, with one lucky Grand Prize winner scoring a seat upgrade down into the lower bowl.

The entry deadline is at noon on Wednesday, August 14. Winners will be notified via email, so make sure to use a valid one when you enter to win. Winners will also be transferred tickets through the Ticketmaster app.

Tickets are still available for the Metallica shows in Minneapolis.

You can click the button above to see ticket availability for each show.

Keep in mind that the stadium will have its Clear Bag Policy in effect for this event. This means that only bags that are clear plastic, vinyl, or PVC and do not exceed 12” x 6” x 12” will be permitted into the stadium. Small clutch bags that are 8.5" x 5.5" with or without a handle or strap, may be carried into the stadium along with one of the clear bag options.
